Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Boston in 1981...
Earned first career win on 5/14/1984...
Injured on 5/31/1984 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 9/20/1984 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/13/1985 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1986, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/15/1990 to a 4-year deal worth $16,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/10/1992 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/4/1993 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
